scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: 2000, Aug. 27. From: Horan. To: [Faculty and Staff]. Subject: Jeanne Cleary Disclosure. [The Jeanne Cleary Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crimes Statistics (formerly the Campus Security Act)
2001, Apr. 5. [From: Thomas D. Horan. To: UPG Community. Subj.: Appointment] [announcement of the promotion of Simeon C. McClean, Sr. to post of Assistant Director of Safety and Security]
2001, Oct. 11. TDH to all Department Heads. Subject: Van Policy in re "...all vans owned by the University of Pittsburgh..."

2005, July 13 via e-mail. To: upgpolice@pitt.edu [cc To: UPG Faculty/Staff] Subject: New Members. [Announces the appointment of new members of the Dept. of Safety and Security: Robin Shuglie and Jared Stern.]

2005, Sept. 2 via e-mail. From: Thomas D. Horan [To: UPG Faculty/Staff] Subject: Van Crash. [A 15 passenger van from the University of Utah State crashed on a highway 65 miles north of Salt Lake City. A driver and 7 students were killed when the van overturned. In 2001, UPG instituted a van certification program to educate and provide training when operating these vans.]

2010, July 22. [Ltr. Format] [From: Sharon P. Smith, President. To: Dear Colleagues] [Subj.: Message from Pres. Smith in re Commander Schreiber.] [Announces the appointment, by Exec. Vice Chancellor Jerome Cochran, of Kathleen Schreiber of the Pgh. Campus Police Dept. as Regional Commander who will interact regularly with the heads of the regional campus police departments on regional issues in all system discussions of safety and security. She will continue to report directly to Chief Delaney on the Pgh. campus. Commander Schreiber's office is on the Pitt-Greensburg campus. Appointment effective 7/1/10.]
2015, Sept. 9. From: Carl A. Rossman, Jr. to [Campus Community] Subject: [New Chief of Campus Police, Daniel P. Lynch.]
2015, Oct. 12. From: Pitt-Greensburg Campus Police. To: [Campus Community] Subject: Crime Alert 10/12/15 4:34 p.m. Non-specific threat Cassell Hall.

2015, Oct. 12. From: Pitt-Greensburg Campus Police. To: [Campus Community] Subject: Crime Alert Cancelled 10/12/15 7:50 p.m. Situation involving Cassell Hall resolved. No unresolved issues. Resume all normal activities.
2015, Nov. 5. From: Pitt-Greensburg Campus Police. To: Campus Community. [Police phone number 724-836-9865: out-of-service and restitution of service for Verizon phone service subscribers.]
2016, July 26. To: Campus Community. Subj.: State Police Helicopter Coming to Campus...July 21...[as part of Camp Cadet experience.]

2016, Aug. 2. To: Campus Community. Subj.: Table Top Exercise, Aug. 3. [...static exercise [by Pitt-Greensburg Campus Police and other area emergency response agencies] should a large scale emergency ever occur...on campus...]

2016, Aug. 3. To: Campus Community. Subj.: 2016 Cleary Act Notice. [...required notification to member of the Campus Community by the Federal Cleary Act of emergency drills to better prepare for an actual emergency and that the University is prepared to respond to an emergeny incident occurring on campus.]

2017, Apr. 20. From: Chief D. Lynch. To: Campus Community. Subj.: Campus Crime Alert [investigation of a prowling incident...asking campus residents to be aware...suggest precautionary measures to be taken.]
2018, Feb. 19. Fr.: Pitt-Greensburg Campus Police. To: Campus Community. Subj.: Guest and Visitor Parking Passes. [...inquiry about visitor/guest parking policy...]
